name: Udemy Project Boost Protoype
description:
This is my first upload on itch.io so go easy on me ;)

I've just been following along with GameDev.tv's Unity3D course and this is the first proper 3D project I've finished so far. It's not amazing -- I know; and I do hope to improve a lot of the features at a later date (and add new ones).

But I'm proud of where it's at right now and wanted to share ^^

- James
